meaningMnemonic: It's <kanji>obsolete</kanji>, so you’re going to <kanji>abandon</kanji> it. This is the act of <vocabulary>disposal</vocabulary>. Whatever it is, you’re <vocabulary>disposing</vocabulary> of or <vocabulary>scrapping</vocabulary> it because it’s no longer needed.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
